string-array.name: walkthrough_text
string-array.item: Let\'s learn how to get RollWithMe working in a few simple steps.
You\'ll start by putting Sphero on the ground near you.
Next, you\'ll be asked to hold your phone over Sphero, like this.
Then, you\'ll use the camera view to center Sphero in the crosshairs.
Next, you\'ll touch the screen in the center of the crosshairs, causing Sphero to roll away from the center.
Hold your phone motionless during this step so that RollWithMe can measure Sphero\'s movement correctly.
Once Sphero stops moving and your screen turns magenta, Sphero will be ready to roll with you. Now, enough talk, let\'s do it!
